long.en:
Do you trust your memory? Are you wasting time trying to find where you read something?
Did you get a brilliant idea while watching YouTube but have nowhere to record it?
Are you worried about where to save important articles you want to keep?

No need to worry anymore. Web Memo clearly solves all your concerns.

ğŸ”‘ Key Features:

1. ğŸ“ The Magic of Memo: Capture the moment by opening the side panel whenever inspiration strikes. Whether it's from YouTube videos or web articles, inspiration can come from anywhere!
2. ğŸ” Smart Summary: Grasp web pages at a glance with ChatGPT's power. Get the essence of long texts - save time, double the knowledge!
3. ğŸ‘€ At-a-Glance Memos: Check your organized notes at a glance. Even complex thoughts become neatly organized.
4. ğŸ’¾ Secure Data Management: Save your precious ideas worry-free. Export to Excel file when needed.
5. âš¡ Quick Shortcuts:
    - Open/Close Side Panel: Alt + S / Option + S
    - Save Memo: Windows + S / Command + S

ğŸ“¬ Communication Channels:

Your feedback makes Web Memo better. Please let us know if you have any suggestions for new features or improvements!

- âœ‰ï¸ Email: gueit214@naver.com
- ğŸ’¬ KakaoTalk: https://open.kakao.com/o/sido56Pg
- ğŸ“‹ Google Form: https://forms.gle/UGK1mMgNtDFh27H99

-----------------------------------------------------------------

v0.0.2 (2024.08.28)
- Initial service launch

v0.1.0 (2024.09.01)
- Introduced side panel and real-time data transmission feature

v0.2.0 (2024.09.03)
- Added shortcuts (Windows: Alt + S, Mac: Option + S)
- Added summary saving feature
- Added view memo in new tab feature

v0.3.0 (2024.09.09)
- Added multi-language support (Korean/English) and bug fixes

v1.0.0 (2024.09.21)
- Opened communication channels (Google Form, Instagram, KakaoTalk)
- Fixed light mode bug

v1.1.0 (2024.09.22)
- Transferred memo management feature to company website

v1.3.0 (2024.09.26)
- Added installation guide page
- Added memo data export feature (CSV, JSON formats)

v1.4.0 (2024.10.11)
- Added Kakao and Google account login options
- Introduced cloud-based permanent data storage

v1.5.0 (2024.10.14)
- Improved memo viewing interface

v1.5.2 (2024.10.18)
- Fixed bug where memos were being saved multiple times

v1.5.3 (2024.10.22)
- Fixed bug where memos occasionally weren't being saved

v1.5.5 (2024.10.27)
- Fixed bug where memos appeared duplicated in memo view

v1.5.6 (2024.11.15)
- Added wishlist feature

v1.6.0 (2024.11.18)
- Added category feature

v1.7.0 (2024.12.06)
- Calendar view
- Ability to select and delete/modify multiple memo groups
- Category settings feature
- Guide restart function
